[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Touch\_2](./blockly.touch_2.md) &gt; [getTouchIdentifierFromEvent](./blockly.touch_2.gettouchidentifierfromevent.md)

## Touch\_2.getTouchIdentifierFromEvent() function

Get the touch identifier from the given event. If it was a mouse event, the identifier is the string 'mouse'.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getTouchIdentifierFromEvent(e: Event | PseudoEvent): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event \| PseudoEvent | Mouse event or touch event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The touch identifier from the first changed touch, if defined. Otherwise 'mouse'.
